comment: Added a hierarchical view of the roadmap for easier navigation through topics.
Improved user experience by securely saving preferences and progress for faster loading.
Introduced a personalized dashboard to track completed lessons and quizzes.
Enhanced quiz feedback with explanations for correct and incorrect answers.
Added quizzes for each lesson topic to make learning more interactive and engaging.
Launched progress streaks to encourage consistent learning.
Combined data structures and algorithms into a single roadmap for a seamless learning journey.
Launched guided lessons for key programming topics to help users learn effectively.
Introduced premium subscriptions with exclusive features and priority support.
Added weekly challenges to help users stay motivated and track their progress.
Provided detailed code solutions to popular coding problems for better understanding.
Redesigned the website for a cleaner look and easier navigation.
Separated data structures, algorithms, and other concepts for a more focused learning experience.
Introduced a concepts page to practice essential programming techniques.
Added progress tracking to help users monitor their learning journey.
Launched a home page with release notes to keep users updated on new features.
Enabled account synchronization using Google authentication.
Introduced customizable themes, including dark mode, light mode, and system default.
Added a problems page to explore questions by companies and topics.
Curated popular coding problems from top tech companies.
Initial release of the platform.
